name: Strategic Depth
description:
Strategic Depth is a tower defence war game, where structures have a realistic line of sight and limited ammunition. The game map presents different terrain challenges to you and your enemies, as they will react and attempt to perform coordinated attacks, retreat and flank your defences. Use the features of the terrain to create the ultimate defence against the incoming invaders. 

Will you outsmart the larger enemy force? Will you be able to defend your country against an incoming horde? Or maybe you just want to see how far you can push our game while playing co-op...

Strategic depth is still in development and we are looking for feedback and suggestions to make the game as polished as possible. Also, if you encounter any problems, feel free to reach out! We will be releasing a new build every week on Saturday.

Only controllers are supported (keyboard and mouse support will be added soon). The game supports local coop of up to 2 players.
